title: PRESIDENT’S SPEECH CANCELLED IN LONDON DUE TO PRO-LTTE PROTESTS
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The Hindu reported that Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa was forced to cancel a Speaking engagement in London’s business hub because security concerns after Tamil activists threatened to hold a large demonstration against alleged human rights abuses in Sri Lanka, Hasan Suroor  the Hindu’s London correspondent quoting the Sri…
